name: StencylOS
description:
StencylOs is a game where you can use the MS-DOS commands that you knew from the 1980's to get skill in a game. Explore the game using commands and apps that are based-off the oldish days. Now in 2.0 stage! 941 lines of code written so far!

Development is still happening, so don't worry!

-stencylpencil
